title: Quote Generator
description: Quote Generator is a web app that generates random quotes via an API and allows sharing on ùïè (formerly Twitter).

title: Infinite Scroll
description: Infinite Scroll is a web app that fetches random images via an API.

title: Joke Teller
description: Joke teller is a app fetches jokes from JokeAPI and reads them aloud using ResponsiveVoice API.

title: Picture in Picture
description: Picture in Picture allows you to watch videos in a floating window while multitasking across apps or sites. It utilizes the Screen Capture API to capture your screen and the Picture in Picture API to display the video.

title: Light & Dark Mode
description: This light and dark mode switcher uses the localStorage API to save your preference.

title: Animated Template
description: This app is an animated template using the AOS library and Creative Tim Tailwind Starter Kit.

title: Animated Navigation
description: This app creates an animated, responsive navigation with a floating action button that changes CSS variables.

title: Music Player
description: Music Player is a simple app that plays music from your local storage.

title: Video Player
description: This app creates a custom video player. It supports play, pause, volume control, full screen, fast-forward, and rewind.

title: Custom Countdown
description: A simple countdown timer that can be set to any date.

title: Bookmark Keeper
description: Bookmark Keeper is a web app that saves your bookmarks in your browser's local storage.

title: Form Validation
description: This project aims to understand the functionality and style of a simple form validation. Ensures that fields such as email, password, and username meet specified criteria such as valid format, length, and non-empty status.

title: Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock Game
description:
This is a simple Rock Paper Scissors Lizard Spock game.

How to Play:
1. Choose your move by clicking on one of the buttons.
2. The computer will randomly choose its move.
3. The winner will be determined based on the rules found here.
4. Click the "Play Again" button to start a new game.

title: NASA API Pictures
description: This project fetches pictures from the NASA website using the NASA API, utilizing the `fetch` API and `async/await` for handling responses.

title: Paint
description: Paint is a clone of the classic Windows Paint application, featuring basic functionalities like drawing, color selection, brush size adjustment, and saving.

title: Pong Game
description:
The Pong game operates on an HTML canvas and offers interactive gameplay with the following features:

- Two paddles: one controlled by the player and the other by the computer, displayed on the canvas.
- Horizontal movement of paddles to interact with a vertically moving ball.
- Ball changes direction upon hitting paddles or canvas walls.
- Tracks scores for both player and computer, ending when one reaches a winning score.
- Declares either 'Player' or 'Computer' as the winner upon game completion, with an option to play again.

title: Drag and Drop
description: This is Kanban board with drag and drop functionality to organize tasks into columns.

title: Calculator
description: This is a simple calculator.

title: Splash Page
description: This project is a simple splash page. It provides users with a dynamic experience through background color options. JavaScript enables users to change the background color interactively.

title: Math Sprint Game
description: Math Sprint Game tests your multiplication skills by presenting questions that require quick and accurate answers. Tap the correct option to respond to the questions displayed on the screen. You can select from 10, 25, 50, or 99 questions per session and track your best scores for each option.

title: Exchange Rate Calculator
description: Select countries to get the exchange rate for a specific amount, using the Exchange Rate API.

title: ASCII Donut Animation
description: This project contains JavaScript code that creates a spinning donut animation using ASCII characters.

title: Background Generator
description: This simple app allows users to select two colors using a color picker to generate a linear gradient background. It displays the CSS code for the gradient on the screen, which users can copy to the clipboard with a click. Additionally, users can generate a new gradient by clicking the generate button.

title: Password Generator
description: This is a simple password generator app. Users can select a password length from 8 to 128 characters and choose to include uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols. The app generates a random password based on these preferences, displays it on the screen, and allows users to copy it to the clipboard with a click. Users can generate a new password by clicking the generate button.

title: QR Code Generator
description: This simple QR Code generator app, allows users to enter a URL and generate a QR code for it. Users can download the QR code as a PNG file, change its color and background color, adjust its size, and share the QR code.

title: Pixel Art Generator
description: This project provides a simple and fun interface for creating pixel art. Users can select colors from a palette to paint pixels on a grid, adjust the grid size to increase or decrease the canvas area, and clear the entire canvas to start a new pixel art creation.

title: Rich Text Editor
description: This project is a rich text editor that allows users to format text, choose colors, change text size, and align text. It includes options for bullet points, numbering, adding links, and saving text as HTML.

title: Flip Coin Game
description: This simple flip coin game allows users to flip a coin and see the result. It tracks the number of heads and tails flipped and provides an option to reset the count.

title: New Year Countdown
description: This landing page counts down from the current date to the next New Year. It calculates and displays the days, hours, minutes, and seconds remaining, shows a spinner before loading the countdown, and features the coming year in the background.

title: Translator
description: This simple translator app uses the MyMemory API to provide translations. Users can type a word and see its translation.

title: Snake Game
description: The Snake game is a simple game played with arrow keys. The snake moves and changes direction with the arrow keys, eats food to grow, and the game ends if the snake hits the wall or itself. Users can also view their scores.

title: Type Test
description: This simple type test app uses the Quotable API. Users can type words and see if they are correct, view the number of correct and incorrect words typed, and see the accuracy of their typing.

title: Speak Number Guess
description: This number guessing game uses the speech recognition API. Users speak their guess into the microphone, and the app processes the guess to check if it's correct. The UI guides the user to speak their guess and provides feedback on whether the guess is higher, lower, a match, or not a number.

title: Text To Speech
description: This simple text-to-speech app allows users to write text and listen to it. Users can also change the language of the text.

title: Todo List
description: This simple todo list allows users to add todos, mark todos as pending, and view all todos.

title: Expense Tracker
description: This expense tracker helps you keep track of income and expenses. It features a UI to display transaction items, show balance, expense, and income totals, add new transactions, delete items from the list, and persist data to local storage.

title: Memory Cards
description: This memory cards allows users to view, add, and remove memory cards containing questions and answers. It uses CSS to create interactive flip cards and provides an 'Add new card' overlay with a form for inputting new cards. Cards display questions and reveal answers when clicked. Users can navigate between previous and next cards, and new cards are stored in local storage with an option to clear all stored cards.

title: Live Code Editor
description: Live Code Editor is a web application that allows you to write, edit, and run HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code in real time. It offers a code editor and a preview panel with a user-friendly interface, so you can see instant results of code changes. Live Code Editor helps you improve and share your web development skills.

title: Url Shortner
description: This project is a simple web application that shortens URLs using the TinyURL API. Users input a URL and click 'Short It' to generate a shortened URL, which is displayed in a textarea. Clicking 'Reload' refreshes the page and clears inputs.

title: Chess Game
description: Here's a simple web application developed for the game of chess. The application allows users to check for checkmate, flip the board, and set custom positions. It's built using CSS and JavaScript for board functionality, utilizing jQuery and Chess.js libraries. The interface is user-friendly, providing automatic updates to the board as the game progresses.

title: Device Battery Detector
description: This simple device battery detector app allows users to view the battery level and charging status of their device.
